definition: Ish-Bosheth, a son of King Saul

translations.da: Ish-Bosheth, en søn af kong Saul
translations.de: Isch-Boschet, ein Sohn von König Saul
translations.it: Ish-Bosheth, un figlio del re Saul
translations.ja: サウル王の息子イシュ＝ボシェト
translations.nb: Is-Bosjet, en sønn av kong Saul
translations.nl: Ish-Bosheth, een zoon van koning Saul
translations.pt: Ish-Bosheth, um filho do rei Saul
translations.ro: Ish-Bosheth, un fiu al regelui Saul
translations.sv: Ish-Bosheth, en son till kung Saul
translations.zh: 以实-波设，扫罗王的儿子
